title: Edward Said (Writers in Conversation)
brief_description: Edward Said, through much of his work, is concerned with the identity of the Palestinians, a dispersed and dispossessed people attempting to come to terms with exile. In this interview with Salman Rushdie, Edward Said explains the history and evolution of the Palestinian people.
